text: The Mercedes-Benz Actros is a truck built by Daimler Truck/Mercedes-Benz. The vehicle was built in 1995. Daimler Truck launched the version II of the Actros in 2002, while the version III was launched in 2007. The fourth generation, called "the New Actros", was launched in July 2011. ==Other websites== * Category:Trucks
title: Mercedes-Benz Actros
